column4: Hi guys! I have used ubuntu in VM under windows but now it is the first time that I am using VM to use windows under ubuntu. Which one of these options would let me do it easier and would offer the larger support for programs that I would like to install under windows (e.g. britannia, chessmamster, comsol (or femlab)) thanks
the options: vmware workstation, xen (I still dont know how to use it), parallel, virtualbox
I use VirtuaBox OSE and it works for everything I need
